author: A_Brickset_user
title: Very good, but still flawed.
review:
Well, I'm a huge fan of the LEGO Island games, so I had to pick this one up.  I thought it was very well-done, but could have been better.
Pros:
~ Gameplay is very good
~ Fun mini-games
~ The Island itself is VERY well-built and laid-out

Cons:
~ I've beaten the game, but people still talk as if I have one mini-game to beat, and as if the Brickster is still free(and a good guy).
~ You have to do the mini-games three times, on three different levels.  No choice, you must.  Why not just add more mini-games?
